nodes.bodyText: What was the reason you passed in the agent? It looks to be unused in runJitdump.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -341,9 +341,11 @@ static TR_CompilationErrorCode recompileMethodForLog(
    return compErrCode;
    }
 
-/// Dumps JIT-specific crash info
-IDATA dumpJitInfo(J9VMThread *crashedThread, char *logFileLabel, J9RASdumpContext *context)
+omr_error_t
+runJitdump(char *label, J9RASdumpContext *context, J9RASdumpAgent *agent)

nodes.bodyText:
This was done for two reasons:

To stay consistent with other dump agents [1]
For future changes where we will allow additional sub-options to be passed to -Xdump:jit to have finer control over jitdump generation process

[1] https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/blob/2054d856333aab1b46166f989e1ee904622b7930/runtime/rasdump/dmpagent.c#L453-L454
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -341,9 +341,11 @@ static TR_CompilationErrorCode recompileMethodForLog(
    return compErrCode;
    }
 
-/// Dumps JIT-specific crash info

+omr_error_t
+runJitdump(char *label, J9RASdumpContext *context, J9RASdumpAgent *agent)
